info.title: Corporate Professionals WebApp API
info.description: Backend API for connecting corporate professionals and recruiters

post.description: Google OAuth signup using google-auth library

get.description: Get current user's full profile (always visible to owner)

Get user profile with privacy control
- Full profile for owner/admins
- Public view respects hide_profile
- Recruiter tag visibility
- Minimal info when profile hidden (only name + recruiter tag)

schema.title: Response Get Profile Api Profiles  User Id  Get

put.description:
Update user profile
- Only owner/admin can update
- Supports recruiter tag toggle
- Supports hide profile toggle
- Validates required fields

get.description:
Get profile completion percentage
Profile completion status

post.description:
Upload or update user CV to Google Cloud Storage
- Only owner/admin can upload
- Supports PDF/DOCX files
- Stores in GCS with proper access control
- Updates user record with GCS URL

delete.description:
Remove user CV from Google Cloud Storage
- Deletes file from GCS bucket
- Clears CV URL from user record

get.description: Search professionals and job postings with advanced filtering.

schema.title: Response Search Directory Api Directory  Get

post.description:
Create a new post in the system.
Any user can create posts

Post Types:
- job: Job opportunities (must include industry tag)
- announcement: Professional announcements
- update: Career updates

Required Fields:
- title: 5-100 characters
- content: 10-2000 characters
- post_type: One of [job, announcement, update]
- industry: Required for job posts
- job_title: Required for job posts

Advanced post search with cursor-based pagination
---
Example request with cursor:
{
    "query": "python developer",
    "industry": "Technology",
    "cursor": "2023-10-05T12:34:56.789,abc123-def456-ghi789",
    "limit": 50
}

get.description:
Retrieve posts by a specific user with pagination
User content visibility

schema.title: Response Read User Posts Api Posts User  User Id  Get

get.description:
Get detailed view of a single post
Post visibility

put.description:
Update an existing post.
Post management

Rules:
- Only the post author can update their posts
- Admins can update any post
- Job posts must maintain industry tag

delete.description:
Delete a post (soft delete).
Post management

Rules:
- Post author can delete their own posts
- Admins can delete any post

schema.title: Response Admin List Users Api Admin Users Get
Response Bulk User Actions Api Admin Users Bulk Actions Post
Response Admin List Posts Api Admin Posts  Get

get.description: Get current dropdown options using enums and skill model

Personalized feed with:
- Followed users' posts
- Industry-relevant content
- Skill-matched posts
- Engagement-based ranking
- Fresh posts highlight
- Cursor pagination
